answers.answer: HiReally sorry to hear that.I read through your post very carefully and based on that I feel that you could possibly be suffering from glove-and-stocking neuropathy or from Sjogren's Syndrome. http://www.medicinenet.com/sjogrens_syndrome/page2.htm. Please consult a neurologist at the earliest. There are many causes of this nerve disorder including diabetes, hypothyroidism, chronic involvement of liver or kidney, chronic alcohol use etc. Upset stomach could be due to involvement of liver so food is not digested properly. Chances of your symptoms being due to autoimmune disorders like Sjogren's Syndrome are more. You will need to run more tests for the same. Adhesion related disorders have varied symptoms. Please  refer http://www.clarkgerhart.com/ard.htmlPlease seek professional advice fro a neurologist soon. Let me know what your doctors say. If you need more help, please feel free to contact. I’ll be happy to answer your queries.

question: I thought that I may ask if any of you have any suggestions for me.I have had pain in both my arms from elbows down and legs from knees down for 4 years.  In addition now both of my hips hurt, I have trouble sleeping and wake up in pain like I have been running all night.   I have had fibroid cysts for 2 years and recently diagnosed with Adhesion disorder-never had any surgeries.  My eyes started being chronically dry 6 months ago. I occassionally drop things as my hands seem to loosed on their own.  I get an upset stomach and vomit an average of twice a week.I have gone to 3 primaries, allergist, GI specialist, and rheumatologist.  Now it was suggested I see a Nerve dr.  All of them say they don't know what is the cause and they can't help me.  I am 31 years old, average weight, have an active life and have never had health problems before.  I have had many blood tests with negative ANA, vitamin levels normal-only Iron was "minimally" low.I don't know what it is and I am feeling at a loss of what to do now.  Has anyone tried any alternative medicines that they could suggest as I feel that the medical community is not going to help me.
title: 4 years of pain
